item.description:
It's been awhile since we trivia, and with Dave retired from the Sambar Trivia night, it might be time to try a new place.

Celtica on Long Wharf has trivia every Thursday at 9, and I'd like to give that a shot. Any brave souls want to come with me to check it out?  For those who haven't been to Celtica, it's roomy with a great atmosphere, and maybe the best french fries in Newport.

I'm posting this for the week after next (the 29th), but if anyone wants to give it a go next week ( the 22nd), I'm up for that as well. Let me know!

 

If this goes well I'd like to make it a regular thing.
item.name: The Return of Pub Trivia!
